statements: SELECT * FROM student_interactions;
SELECT student_id, lesson_id FROM student_interactions WHERE interaction_type='quiz' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT lesson_id, interaction_type, interaction_duration FROM student_interactions WHERE student_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(interaction_type) AS total_interactions FROM student_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE interaction_duration > 300 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT student_id, lesson_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type, interaction_duration FROM student_interactions WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'quiz' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT student_id, lesson_id FROM student_interactions WHERE interaction_duration > 10 AND interaction_type = 'discussion'
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM student_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY interaction_count DESC
SELECT AVG(interaction_duration) AS avg_duration FROM student_interactions
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT lesson_id, interaction_type FROM student_interactions WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT lesson_id, score FROM lesson_performance WHERE completion_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM student_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM student_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, lesson_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM student_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'quiz' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT lesson_id, completion_status, score FROM lesson_performance WHERE completion_status = 'completed' ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, lesson_id, interaction_type FROM student_interactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT lesson_id, completion_status, score FROM lesson_performance WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY lesson_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, lesson_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_interaction FROM student_interactions GROUP BY user_id, lesson_id ORDER BY last_interaction DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM StudentInteractions;
SELECT lesson_name, lesson_difficulty, lesson_duration FROM Lessons;
SELECT student_id, lesson_id, interaction_date, interaction_duration FROM StudentInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, student_id, analysis_date, analysis_score FROM PerformanceAnalysis WHERE analysis_score > 80;
SELECT lesson_name, lesson_subject, lesson_duration FROM Lessons WHERE lesson_subject = 'Math';
SELECT student_id, lesson_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM StudentInteractions;
SELECT lesson_name, lesson_subject, lesson_difficulty, lesson_duration FROM Lessons WHERE lesson_duration > 60;
SELECT student_id, lesson_id, analysis_score, analysis_feedback FROM PerformanceAnalysis WHERE analysis_score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM StudentInteractions JOIN Lessons ON StudentInteractions.lesson_id = Lessons.lesson_id;
SELECT student_id, interaction_date, analysis_score FROM StudentInteractions JOIN PerformanceAnalysis ON StudentInteractions.student_id = PerformanceAnalysis.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, registration_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT lesson_name, lesson_type FROM lessons WHERE is_completed = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, lesson_name, interaction_date FROM students JOIN interactions ON students.student_id = interactions.student_id;
SELECT student_name, lesson_name, performance_score FROM students JOIN performance_analysis ON students.student_id = performance_analysis.student_id WHERE performance_score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, registration_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT lesson_name, lesson_type FROM lessons WHERE is_completed = true;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_duration FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, lesson_id, performance_score FROM performance_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, lesson_completed_date FROM students WHERE lesson_score > 80;
SELECT lesson_name, lesson_description FROM lessons WHERE lesson_difficulty = 3;
SELECT student_id, lesson_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM lesson_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT lesson_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM performance_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY lesson_completed_date DESC, lesson_score ASC;
SELECT student_name, lesson_name, lesson_score FROM students JOIN student_performance ON students.student_id = student_performance.student_id ORDER BY lesson_score DESC;

SELECT student_name, lesson_name, performance_score FROM students JOIN student_performance ON students.student_id = student_performance.student_id WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM lesson_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'quiz' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT student_name, lesson_name, performance_feedback FROM students JOIN student_performance ON students.student_id = student_performance.student_id ORDER BY performance_feedback ASC;
